nodes.text: The quad turbolaser cannon (also called quad turbolaser battery) was a heavier version of the quad laser cannon designed for cruisers. The Droid Control Ships, for example, used by the Trade Federation during the Invasion of Naboo and the Clone Wars were fitted with 42 quad turbolaser cannons. The quad turbolaser cannons installed aboard the Invisible Hand had maximum power output that was the equivalent of a Magnitude 10 earthquake.
